entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Embrace spans more in `System.Reflection.Emit`. #63419
  • Relocation error when app is run from terminal, but works correctly from VS Code debug session #63418
  • AddNETStandardCompatErrorFileForPackaging should allow for libraries to add their own buildTransitive logic #63413
  • [Test] LibariesConfiguration should automatically be detected for runtime tests #63412
  • System.MissingMethod.Exception when using static abstract method #63411
  • Ensure we are building against LTTng with latest fixes #63407
  • [mono][llvm] Fully support .NET exceptions with LLVM on x64, x86, arm64, arm32 #63404
    7.0.0
  • Consider adding "no new features" note to low churn libraries #63401
    7.0.0
  • No way to auto-restart Worker Service running as Windows Service on failure #63400
  • [wasm][aot] Exception Handling Improvements #63399
    7.0.0
  • Enable storing pinned locals in registers #63397
  • Regex NonBacktracking lazy loops with IgnoreCase, and repeaters aren't as lazy as they should be #63395
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.FileLoadException: File name: 'Azure.Core, Version=1.19.0.0 #63396
  • `Console.ReadKey` behaves differently in .NET 6 comparing to .NET 5 when `TERM` is set to `rxvt` #63387
  • Investigate OutOfMemory Exception happening woth Regex.Match for some patterns in the interpreted engine. #63385
    7.0.0
  • CoreCLR, CoreRT and Android #63384
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Analyzer for detecting multiple Enumerations #63381
  • System.Text.Json 6.0.1 - Inclusion of build\System.Text.Json.targets file in NuGet package is causing failure in WiX Heat tool #63379

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Allow to pass switch mappings to Host.CreateDefaultBuilder method along with the command line arguments array #63141
  • Cannot create instance of type 'System.Text.Json.JsonDocument' because it is missing a public parameterless constructor. #63061
    7.0.0
  • Regression: Aborted (core dumped) when running .NET 6.0 app in Docker on linux-arm host #62402
  • .NET built against LTTng 2.13 crashes while initializing LTTng #62398
    7.0.0
  • NullReferenceException when closing HttpListener #63345
    Future
  • [WASM][Browser] DebuggerTests.ArrayTests: EXECUTION TIMED OUT #63167
  • System Management aka WMI isn't working on ARM64 #63137
  • Test failure Interop\\StringMarshalling\\VBByRefStr\\VBByRefStrTest\\VBByRefStrTest.cmd #63003
  • TypeLoadException from dynamically-generated assembly; does not occur from the same assembly loaded from disc #63294
  • [wasm][debugger] Not able to find a class without the namespace #62010
  • [wasm][debugger] Not able to evaluate a static class attribute #61147
    7.0.0
  • PropertyNamingPolicy is not applied to ExpandoObject/dynamic objects #62101
  • .NET Standard 2.0 should have an overload of Encoding.GetString() that takes a ReadOnlySpan<byte> parameter. #62340
  • Add Repobeats Stats to README.md #62838
  • Path.GetInvalidPathChars() Does not Return the Same Character Set between .NET4.8 and .NET 6.0.1 on Windows #63383
  • Undefined symbol "pthread_create" under FreeBSD when running apps #2463
    Future
  • DotNet HttpClient doesn't give SSL Error While curl and Java fails #55322
    Future
  • libmsquic not on Debian 11 package repository? #60104

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor DllImports in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd #63421
    community-contribution
  • JIT: save generics context for late devirtualization #63420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add instructions for running on FreeBSD #63417
    community-contribution
  • Begin using the xplat hardware intrinsics to simplify the SIMD code in the libraries #63416
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure UserSecretsIdAttribute is added to assembly #63415
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Implement the last of the approved cross platform hardware intrinsics, except shuffle #63414
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make DllImportGenerator unit tests' compilations use live refs #63410
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix ABI stress test coverage #63409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Avoiding Bimodal GC behavior #63408
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: rework logic for when OSR imports method entry #63406
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the MacOS remote unwinder for VS4Mac #63405
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] GetProperties broken on chrome #63403
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve Regex UpdateBumpalong optimization for non-atomic and lazy loops #63398
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Change macOS activatin injection failure handling #63393
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Fix Creating Cultures with Sort Names #63386
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Validate behavior of ProcessInfo command before and after suspension point #63382
    test enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Build fixes #63380

Merged

  • Arm64: Memory barrier improvements #62895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: refactor fields of GenTreeCall #63402
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete __SkipCrossgenFramework #63390
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] bump sourcebuild leg timeout #63298
    area-Infrastructure
  • Handle race condition when HttpListener is stopped or closed #63394
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix the MacOS remote unwinder for VS4Mac #63378
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Simplify condition in System.Private.CoreLib.Shared.projitems #63388
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix MethodDesc::CbStackPop for string ctors on x86 #63391
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove some unnecessary duplicated checks #63341
    area-Meta
  • Remove dead code in OdbcCommandBuilder.UnquoteIdentifier #63363
    area-System.Data
  • Implement `IEquatable<T>` on the runtime handle types. #63358
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Replace name with type and codepage in EncodingConversionOverflow exception #62910
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Fix running WASM tests locally on Windows #63334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Remove dependency of type system tests on ILCompiler.ReadyToRun #63323
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Move HttpRequestStream.{Begin}Read argument logging to after validation #63362
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix null ref for null Stream input in Icon.Save #63369
    area-System.Drawing
  • Remove unnecessary field writes in MimePart.SetContent #63368
    area-System.Net
  • Fix LazyMemberInfo.Equals to return false for null #63372
    area-System.ComponentModel

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix setting timestamp on Windows on readonly files #62922
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1538093 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve auto-atomicity for conditionals #63299
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix JsonObject constuctor #63150
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Making user secrets optional by default #62917
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Undo breaking change in 6.0 in environment variable configuration prefix support #62916
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.x
  • Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Make some icalls pass/return object references using ObjectHandleOnStack/QCallTypeHandle #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix bug where we reference the entry #0 in the pinned plug queue #63351
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Explicit test for injecting scoped IServiceProvider into scoped and transient services (#63225) #63226
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • HttpConnectionPool improvements #62935
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Webpack & NextJS & TypeScript samples #63335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-Meta
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-maui] Add back HAVE_SYS_ZLIB support #63359
    area-Build-mono
  • Convert SAL1 to SAL2 #63333
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reorganize zlib dependency logic #63365
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • HostBuilder.Build doc: mention lifetime #63123
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Performance optimization of FileSystem.CreateDirectory on windows #62860
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Refactor optimizing morph for commutative operations #63251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add coreclr-libraries directory. #62888
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
    area-System.Diagnostics, os-android
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • 'cmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Update `dotnet6` to `dotnet7` NuGet feeds, bump Intellisensense package version to latest in `dotnet7-transport` #63352
